text: CDL is a leading in short tech software
provider we provide software and
services to the major brands across the
insurance sector what we're looking for
was a standardization of our security
platforms that we can use a standard set
of images rather than having hand-rolled
images which teams manage manually also
to maintain compliance and regulation
status the CIS pre-hardened images help
us to maintain the standards that we
need for our accreditation such as PCI
DSS as we process a lot of card
transactions on behalf of our customers
but we also needed to move on to the
graviton infrastructure within AWS and
the weren't images available for that so
we reached out to CIS and we
collaborated on then building an image
and developing that without our feedback
and we now use that to cross graviton as
well as CDL we run a lot of container
and serverless infrastructure so we run
the ec2 infrastructure across ECS and
file gate as well as serverless
functions such as lavender so our
collaboration with CIS has delivered
exactly what we're looking for was a
pre-hardened image that we can roll out
as a standard across all of our
infrastructure and is automatically
updated on a regular cycle which makes
the the regulation certification needs
that our customers have so this is
really important as soon as our
customers are Financial Services sector
because the the data and security is of
utmost priority
